section.name: Lifestyle Management
section.p: A lifestyle is a term that reflects a component implementation approach. Four basic lifestyle strategies are included in the Assembly API - these include the singleton, per-thread, pooled, and transient strategies. More information about these strategies is included in the following table:

subsection.name: Strategies
subsection.p: Overview of the standard lifestyle strategies.

tr.td: A single instance of the component type will be shared by all consumers.
A new instance of the component will be created relative to each distinct thread.
A container shall maintain a pool of components.
New instance of the component are created on a per request basis.
